creator: Klever Wallet: Bitcoin, Ethereum, TRX & Crypto
descriptionHtml:
Klever Wallet is everything you need in a crypto wallet. Using our crypto wallet, you have access to over 2 Blockchain networks and can store coins, tokens, and cryptocurrency assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Klever (KLV), and other top crypto assets safely and anonymously.

Our wallet has evolved into the latest and most powerful crypto feature-packed user experience. Klever Wallet, available in 30+ languages and having been downloaded by over 3 million users worldwide, caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts and cryptocurrency owners.

ADVANCED SECURITY

Klever Wallet is built on Klever OS, which completely protects the user's private keys and makes sensitive data available only on the user's specific device using the latest state-of-the-art encryption technology.

This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin, TRON, Ethereum, and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.

SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS

In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of coins and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.

ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES

Klever Wallet allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance, and other p2p applications.

With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.

FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE

Klever Wallet allows you to exchange Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), and many other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast, and convenient manner at a low cost using our own native Swap technology. Klever Wallet supports p2p Bitcoin (BTC) using Native SegWit technology, which means coins are being transferred faster and more securely.

TOP UP & BUY CRYPTO IN-APP

With Klever Wallet, you can securely invest and buy cryptocurrency with a credit card or EFT using a range of built-in payment providers.

24/7 HUMAN HELP SUPPORT

You won't find bots to support and assist with your crypto wallet issues. We have a dedicated support team that is available 24/7, 365 days a year in different languages, handling each case in a personal and swift manner.

NOTES REGARDING PRIVACY AND SECURITY:

Your Private Key is securely stored on your mobile phone. It is never sent to anyone else. Klever Wallet employees do not have access to your Private Key.

Never share your 12-word seed phrase with anyone. Not ever!*

We cannot recover your funds if you lose your private key or share it with someone else."

JOIN OUR GLOBAL COMMUNITY

Join our growing community of 3.5 million users to share trading strategies and industry information with crypto traders across the globe. Tell us about your experiences and opinions. We offer communities in a variety of languages.

REVIEW OUR TECHNOLOGY & TEAMS

Official Website: https://klever.finance/
Help Center：https://klever.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

Klever App is a simple, secure & decentralized p2p crypto wallet for Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH) and other top coins, tokens and cryptocurrency assets.
With over 2m downloads from 193 countries worldwide, Klever App caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts and cryptocurrency holders. The wallet is available in 30 different languages.

This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin, TRON, Ethereum and other crypto tokens. No third party, including Klever App, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.

Klever App enables you to exchange your Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH) and other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast and convenient way at a low cost on its native Swap tool. Klever App support for p2p Bitcoin (BTC) uses SegWit technology, which means transfer of coins are faster and more secure in the wallet.

creator: Klever Wallet: Bitcoin, Ethereum, TRX & Crypto
descriptionHtml:
Klever Wallet is everything you need in a crypto wallet. Using our crypto wallet, you have access to over 2 Blockchain networks and can store coins, tokens, and cryptocurrency assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Klever (KLV), and other top crypto assets safely and anonymously.

Our wallet has evolved into the latest and most powerful crypto feature-packed user experience. Klever Wallet, available in 30+ languages and having been downloaded by over 3 million users worldwide, caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts and cryptocurrency owners.

ADVANCED SECURITY

Klever Wallet is built on Klever OS, which completely protects the user's private keys and makes sensitive data available only on the user's specific device using the latest state-of-the-art encryption technology.

This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin, TRON, Ethereum, and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.

SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS

In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of coins and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.

ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES

Klever Wallet allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance, and other p2p applications.

With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.

FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE

Klever Wallet allows you to exchange Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), and many other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast, and convenient manner at a low cost using our own native Swap technology. Klever Wallet supports p2p Bitcoin (BTC) using Native SegWit technology, which means coins are being transferred faster and more securely.

TOP UP & BUY CRYPTO IN-APP

With Klever Wallet, you can securely invest and buy cryptocurrency with a credit card or EFT using a range of built-in payment providers.

24/7 HUMAN HELP SUPPORT

You won't find bots to support and assist with your crypto wallet issues. We have a dedicated support team that is available 24/7, 365 days a year in different languages, handling each case in a personal and swift manner.

NOTES REGARDING PRIVACY AND SECURITY:

Your Private Key is securely stored on your mobile phone. It is never sent to anyone else. Klever Wallet employees do not have access to your Private Key.

Never share your 12-word seed phrase with anyone. Not ever!*

We cannot recover your funds if you lose your private key or share it with someone else."

JOIN OUR GLOBAL COMMUNITY

Join our growing community of 3.5 million users to share trading strategies and industry information with crypto traders across the globe. Tell us about your experiences and opinions. We offer communities in a variety of languages.

REVIEW OUR TECHNOLOGY & TEAMS

Official Website: https://klever.finance/
Help Center：https://klever.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin, TRON, Ethereum, and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.

SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS

In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of coins and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.

ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES

Klever Wallet allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance, and other p2p applications.

With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.

FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE

Klever Wallet allows you to exchange Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), and many other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast, and convenient manner at a low cost using our own native Swap technology. Klever Wallet supports p2p Bitcoin (BTC) using Native SegWit technology, which means coins are being transferred faster and more securely.

TOP UP & BUY CRYPTO IN-APP

With Klever Wallet, you can securely invest and buy cryptocurrency with a credit card or EFT using a range of built-in payment providers.

24/7 HUMAN HELP SUPPORT

You won't find bots to support and assist with your crypto wallet issues. We have a dedicated support team that is available 24/7, 365 days a year in different languages, handling each case in a personal and swift manner.

NOTES REGARDING PRIVACY AND SECURITY:

Your Private Key is securely stored on your mobile phone. It is never sent to anyone else. Klever Wallet employees do not have access to your Private Key.

Never share your 12-word seed phrase with anyone. Not ever!*

We cannot recover your funds if you lose your private key or share it with someone else."

Using our crypto wallet, you have access to over 17 Blockchain networks and can store coins, tokens, and cryptocurrency assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Klever (KLV), and other top crypto assets safely and anonymously.

Our wallet has evolved into the latest and most powerful crypto feature-packed user experience. Klever Wallet, available in 30+ languages and having been downloaded by over 3 million users worldwide, caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts and cryptocurrency owners.

ADVANCED SECURITY

Klever Wallet is built on Klever OS, which completely protects the user's private keys and makes sensitive data available only on the user's specific device using the latest state-of-the-art encryption technology.

This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin, TRON, Ethereum, and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.

SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS

In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of coins and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.

ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES

Klever Wallet allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance, and other p2p applications.

With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.

FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE

Klever Wallet allows you to exchange Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), and many other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast, and convenient manner at a low cost using our own native Swap technology. Klever Wallet supports p2p Bitcoin (BTC) using Native SegWit technology, which means coins are being transferred faster and more securely.

TOP UP & BUY CRYPTO IN-APP

With Klever Wallet, you can securely invest and buy cryptocurrency with a credit card or EFT using a range of built-in payment providers.

24/7 HUMAN HELP SUPPORT

You won't find bots to support and assist with your crypto wallet issues. We have a dedicated support team that is available 24/7, 365 days a year in different languages, handling each case in a personal and swift manner.

NOTES REGARDING PRIVACY AND SECURITY:

Your Private Key is securely stored on your mobile phone. It is never sent to anyone else. Klever Wallet employees do not have access to your Private Key.

Never share your 12-word seed phrase with anyone. Not ever!*

We cannot recover your funds if you lose your private key or share it with someone else."

JOIN OUR GLOBAL COMMUNITY

Join our growing community of 3.5 million users to share trading strategies and industry information with crypto traders across the globe. Tell us about your experiences and opinions. We offer communities in a variety of languages.

REVIEW OUR TECHNOLOGY & TEAMS

Official Website: https://klever.finance/
Help Center：https://klever.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

title: Klever Wallet: Crypto|BTC|USDT

container.value:
To open a ticket visit https://support.klever.io

Klever App is a simple, secure & decentralized p2p crypto wallet for Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH) and other top coins, tokens and cryptocurrency assets.
With over 2m downloads from 193 countries worldwide, Klever App caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts and cryptocurrency holders. The wallet is available in 30 different languages.

This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin, TRON, Ethereum and other crypto tokens. No third party, including Klever App, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.

Klever App enables you to exchange your Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH) and other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast and convenient way at a low cost on its native Swap tool. Klever App support for p2p Bitcoin (BTC) uses SegWit technology, which means transfer of coins are faster and more secure in the wallet.

creator: Klever Wallet: Bitcoin, Ethereum, TRX & Crypto
descriptionHtml:
Klever Wallet is everything you need in a crypto wallet. Using our crypto wallet, you have access to over 17 Blockchain networks and can store coins, tokens, and cryptocurrency assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Klever (KLV), and other top crypto assets safely and anonymously.

Our wallet has evolved into the latest and most powerful crypto feature-packed user experience. Klever Wallet, available in 30+ languages and having been downloaded by over 3 million users worldwide, caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts and cryptocurrency owners.

ADVANCED SECURITY

Klever Wallet is built on Klever OS, which completely protects the user's private keys and makes sensitive data available only on the user's specific device using the latest state-of-the-art encryption technology.

This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin, TRON, Ethereum, and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.

SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS

In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of coins and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.

ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES

Klever Wallet allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance, and other p2p applications.

With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.

FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE

Klever Wallet allows you to exchange Bitcoin (BTC), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), and many other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast, and convenient manner at a low cost using our own native Swap technology. Klever Wallet supports p2p Bitcoin (BTC) using Native SegWit technology, which means coins are being transferred faster and more securely.

TOP UP & BUY CRYPTO IN-APP

With Klever Wallet, you can securely invest and buy cryptocurrency with a credit card or EFT using a range of built-in payment providers.

24/7 HUMAN HELP SUPPORT

You won't find bots to support and assist with your crypto wallet issues. We have a dedicated support team that is available 24/7, 365 days a year in different languages, handling each case in a personal and swift manner.

NOTES REGARDING PRIVACY AND SECURITY:

Your Private Key is securely stored on your mobile phone. It is never sent to anyone else. Klever Wallet employees do not have access to your Private Key.

Never share your 12-word seed phrase with anyone. Not ever!*

We cannot recover your funds if you lose your private key or share it with someone else."

JOIN OUR GLOBAL COMMUNITY

Join our growing community of 3.5 million users to share trading strategies and industry information with crypto traders across the globe. Tell us about your experiences and opinions. We offer communities in a variety of languages.

REVIEW OUR TECHNOLOGY & TEAMS

Help Center：https://klever.zendesk.com/hc/en-us

descriptionHtml:
Klever Wallet is everything you need in a crypto wallet. Using our crypto blockchain wallet app, you have access to over 30 Blockchain networks and can store coins, tokens, and crypto assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Klever (KLV), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT) and other top crypto assets safely and anonymously.


Our crypto blockchain wallet app has evolved into the latest and most powerful crypto feature-packed user experience. Klever Wallet App, available in 30+ languages and having been downloaded by over 3 million users worldwide, caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts, NFTs and cryptocurrency owners.


ADVANCED SECURITY


Klever Wallet App is built on Klever OS, which completely protects the user's private keys and makes sensitive data available only on the user's specific device using the latest state-of-the-art encryption technology.


This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT), Klever (KLV) and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever Wallet team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.


SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS


In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of crypto coins and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.


ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES


Klever Wallet App allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance (DeFi crypto), and other p2p applications.


With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.


FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE


Klever Wallet App allows you to exchange Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT), Klever (KLV) and many other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast, and convenient manner at a low cost using our own native Swap technology. Klever Wallet supports p2p Bitcoin (BTC) using Native SegWit technology, which means coins are being transferred faster and more securely.


TOP UP & BUY CRYPTO IN-APP


With Klever Wallet App, you can securely invest and buy crypto tokens with a credit card or EFT using a range of built-in payment providers.


24/7 HUMAN HELP SUPPORT


You won't find bots to support and assist with your crypto blockchain wallet app issues. We have a dedicated support team that is available 24/7, 365 days a year in different languages, handling each case in a personal and swift manner.


NOTES REGARDING PRIVACY AND SECURITY


Your Private Key is securely stored on your mobile phone. It is never sent to anyone else. Klever Wallet employees do not have access to your Private Key.


Never share your 12-word seed phrase with anyone. Not ever!*


We cannot recover your funds if you lose your private key or share it with someone else."

descriptionHtml:
Klever Wallet is everything you need in a crypto wallet. Using our crypto blockchain wallet app, you have access to over 30 Blockchain networks and can store coins, tokens, and crypto assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Klever (KLV), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT) and other top crypto assets safely and anonymously.


Our crypto blockchain wallet app has evolved into the latest and most powerful crypto feature-packed user experience. Klever Wallet App, available in 30+ languages and having been downloaded by over 3 million users worldwide, caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts, NFTs and cryptocurrency owners.


ADVANCED SECURITY


Klever Wallet App is built on Klever OS, which completely protects the user's private keys and makes sensitive data available only on the user's specific device using the latest state-of-the-art encryption technology.


This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT), Klever (KLV) and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever Wallet team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.


SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS


In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of crypto coins and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.


ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES


Klever Wallet App allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance (DeFi crypto), and other p2p applications.


With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.


FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE


Klever Wallet App allows you to exchange Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT), Klever (KLV) and many other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast, and convenient manner at a low cost using our own native Swap technology. Klever Wallet supports p2p Bitcoin (BTC) using Native SegWit technology, which means coins are being transferred faster and more securely.


TOP UP & BUY CRYPTO IN-APP


With Klever Wallet App, you can securely invest and buy crypto tokens with a credit card or EFT using a range of built-in payment providers.


24/7 HUMAN HELP SUPPORT


You won't find bots to support and assist with your crypto blockchain wallet app issues. We have a dedicated support team that is available 24/7, 365 days a year in different languages, handling each case in a personal and swift manner.


NOTES REGARDING PRIVACY AND SECURITY


Your Private Key is securely stored on your mobile phone. It is never sent to anyone else. Klever Wallet employees do not have access to your Private Key.


Never share your 12-word seed phrase with anyone. Not ever!*


We cannot recover your funds if you lose your private key or share it with someone else."


JOIN OUR GLOBAL CRYPTO COMMUNITY


Join our growing crypto and blockchain community of 3.5 million users to share trading strategies and industry information with crypto traders across the globe. Tell us about your experiences and opinions about altcoins, DeFi, bitcoin, blockchain and all related to the crypto world. We offer communities in a variety of languages.

Klever Wallet is everything you need in a crypto wallet. Using our crypto blockchain wallet app, you have access to over 30 Blockchain networks and can store coins, tokens, and crypto assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Klever (KLV), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT) and other top crypto assets safely and anonymously.

Our crypto blockchain wallet app has evolved into the latest and most powerful crypto feature-packed user experience. Klever Wallet App, available in 30+ languages and having been downloaded by over 3 million users worldwide, caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts, NFTs and cryptocurrency owners.


ADVANCED SECURITY


Klever Wallet App is built on Klever OS, which completely protects the user's private keys and makes sensitive data available only on the user's specific device using the latest state-of-the-art encryption technology.


This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Tether (USDT), Klever (KLV) and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever Wallet team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.


SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS


In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of crypto coins and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.


ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES


Klever Wallet App allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance (DeFi crypto), and other p2p applications.


With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.


FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE

creator: Klever Wallet: Bitcoin, Ethereum, TRX & Crypto
descriptionHtml:
Klever Wallet is everything you need in a crypto wallet. Using our crypto blockchain wallet app, you have access to over 40 Blockchain networks and can store coins, tokens, and crypto assets such as Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Klever (KLV), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Ripple USD (RLUSD), Tether (USDT) and other top crypto assets safely and anonymously.


Our crypto blockchain wallet app has evolved into the latest and most powerful crypto feature-packed user experience. Klever Wallet app, available in 30+ languages and having been downloaded by over 3 million users worldwide, caters to a global audience of blockchain enthusiasts, NFTs and cryptocurrency owners.


ADVANCED SECURITY


Klever Wallet app is built on Klever OS, which completely protects the user's private keys and makes sensitive data available only on the user's specific device using the latest state-of-the-art encryption technology.


This means you truly own and control your Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Ripple USD (RLUSD), Tether (USDT), Klever (KLV) and other crypto tokens. No third party, including the Klever Wallet team, can access your private keys or restrict any transaction the user decides to make.


SPEED OF TRANSACTIONS


In addition to being direct, safe, and secure, transactions of crypto coins ( Bitcoin BTC, Binance Coin BNB, Binance USD BUSD, Tron TRX, Ripple XRP, Tether USDT, Litecoin LTC, Ethereum ETH etc) and tokens are instantly recorded on the blockchain.


ADVANCED BLOCKCHAIN FEATURES


Klever Wallet app allows you to use the largest selection of decentralized applications on the blockchain, including NFTs, games, entertainment, decentralized finance (DeFi crypto), and other p2p applications.


With Klever Wallets' built-in secure Web Browser, users can explore dapps, decentralized services, and blockchain-based products with a click of a button.


FASTEST SWAP TECHNOLOGY AVAILABLE


Klever Wallet App allows you to exchange Bitcoin (BTC), Bitcoin Cash (BCH), TRON (TRX), Ethereum (ETH), Binance Coin (BNB), Binance USD (BUSD), Ripple (XRP), Ripple USD (RLUSD), Tether (USDT), Klever (KLV), and many other crypto assets, and trade your tokens in a simple, fast, and convenient manner at a low cost using our own native Swap technology. Klever Wallet supports p2p Bitcoin (BTC) using Native SegWit technology, which means coins are being transferred faster and more securely.


TOP UP & BUY CRYPTO IN-APP


With Klever Wallet app, you can securely invest and buy crypto tokens such as Bitcoin (BTC), Binance Coin (BNB), Tron (TRX), Tether (USDT), Ripple (XRP) with a credit card or EFT using a range of built-in payment providers.


24/7 HUMAN HELP SUPPORT


You won't find bots to support and assist with your crypto blockchain wallet app issues. We have a dedicated support team that is available 24/7, 365 days a year in different languages, handling each case in a personal and swift manner.


NOTES REGARDING PRIVACY AND SECURITY


Your Private Key is securely stored on your mobile phone. It is never sent to anyone else. Klever Wallet employees do not have access to your Private Key.


Never share your 12/24-word seed phrase with anyone. Not ever!*


We cannot recover your funds if you lose your private key or share it with someone else."


JOIN OUR GLOBAL CRYPTO COMMUNITY


Join our growing crypto and blockchain community of 3.5 million users to share trading strategies and industry information with crypto traders across the globe. Tell us about your experiences and opinions about altcoins, DeFi, Bitcoin BTC, Binance Coin BNB, Tron TRX, Tether USDT, XRP, blockchain and all related to the crypto world. We offer communities in a variety of languages.


LEARN ABOUT OUR BLOCKCHAIN TECHNOLOGY, COMPANY & TEAMS

Help Center：https://support.klever.org/
